definition[0]: an envelope on which you have written your own name and address, and usually put a stamp, so that someone else can send you something
example[0]: For further details, send an sae to the following address.
definition[1]: stamped addressed envelope; an envelope that you put your name, address, and a stamp on, so that someone can send you something
definition[2]: self-addressed envelope; an envelope that you put your own name and address on
